title: Russia seizes Europe's biggest nuclear plant in 'reckless' assault - Reuters.com
content:
1. Russia seizes Europe's biggest nuclear plant in 'reckless' assault  Reuters.com
  2. 'WAKE UP NOW': Zelenskyy warns Europe of nuclear war after power plant shelling  LiveNOW from FOX
  3. The Ukrainian nuclear operator says management at the seized plant is "working at gunpoint"  CNN
  4. WATCH: View of Kyiv skyline as Ukraine enters second week of war against Russian forces  Washington Post
  5. U.S. Stocks Fall After Russia Shells Ukrainian Nuclear Plant  The Wall Street Journal
description: Russian forces in Ukraine seized Europe's biggest nuclear power plant on Friday in what Washington called a reckless assault that risked catastrophe, although a blaze in a training building was extinguished and officials said the facility was now safe.
